faqs.question: What is the difference between a fit out and a renovation?
faqs.answer: Fit outs involve completing the interior of a bare or shell space—adding flooring, ceilings, partitions, MEP (Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing) works, and final finishes. Renovation typically means updating or remodeling an already finished space.

faqs.question: Do fit out contractors also offer design and planning services?
faqs.answer: Yes, many UAE-based fit out contractors offer end-to-end solutions, including interior design, 3D visualizations, space planning, and authority approvals.

faqs.question: How long does a typical fit out project take in the UAE?
faqs.answer: Timelines vary by project, but most office and residential fit outs in the UAE are completed within 4 to 12 weeks, depending on size, approvals, and complexity.

faqs.question: Are turnkey fit outs cost-effective?
faqs.answer: Turnkey fit outs can save both time and costs by streamlining design, build, and project management into a single, integrated service—minimizing delays and miscommunication.
